com.frankly.franklysdk

Class FranklySdk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frankly.franklysdk.FranklySdk

  • public class FranklySdk
extends Object
    The main interface for initializing and authenticating the Frankly SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FranklySdk.BroadcastActionNames
      Provides the action names that are broadcast and available for integration developers to listen for.
      static interface  FranklySdk.RequestCallback
      The interface used to allow the Frankly SDK to interact with the application.
